articles.author: Emily Langer
articles.title: Len Goodman, stalwart judge on 'Dancing With the Stars,' dies at 78 - The Washington Post
articles.description: The British ballroom dancer became known to millions of American television viewers for his cockney-inflected one-liners.
articles.content: Len Goodman, a British ballroom dancer known to millions of American television viewers as the cockney-accented judge on Dancing With the Stars, the popular reality competition show, died April 22 at… [+4577 chars]
